name: Grapple Whip
detailed_description: This cowboy doesn't have legs so he uses his grappling whip to grapple from A to B. When the whip is attached to a grapple point the player will be pulled towards it. Collect all the gems in a level to progress while swinging. Move the crosshair over a point to attach the whip and move forward. Different kind of grapple points are scattered around the levels and can act differently based on their color. Some move to another place so the player can use them as transport and others give the player more velocity to reach more places. Sometimes it can be beneficial to detach from a point at the right moment to reach a gem or a new point. Watch out for rotating and moving spikes and dropping down in the abyss will make you start over but don’t worry you won’t have to collect all your gems again.
about_the_game: This cowboy doesn't have legs so he uses his grappling whip to grapple from A to B. When the whip is attached to a grapple point the player will be pulled towards it. Different kind of grapple points are scattered around the levels and can act differently based on their color. Sometimes it can be beneficial to detach from a point at the right moment to reach a gem or a new point. Watch out for rotating and moving spikes and dropping down in the abyss will make you start over but don’t worry you won’t have to collect all your gems again.
short_description: You are a cowboy without legs and uses his grapple whip to move around!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Celeron(R) CPU N3450 @ 1.10GHz (cpu 2.2 GHz)
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) HD Graphics (128 MB)
  • Storage: 175 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Compatible windows sound card

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04.2 LTS
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-3632QM CPU @ 2.20GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 7500M/7600M Series
  • Storage: 180 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Compatible sound card
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04.2 LTS
  • Processor: Intel Core I5-6300HQ CPU @ 2.30GHz x 4
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 530 (Skylake GT2)
  • Storage: 180 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Compatible sound card
